text: Finnair is a Finnish airline. The company was established on November 1, 1923. The first flight was in March 1924. Their motto is: Designed for you (). Almost 4470 people worked for Finnair in 2014. == References == * ==Other websites== * Viralliset sivut Category:Companies of Finland Category:Airlines of Europe Category:1923 establishments in Europe Category:1920s establishments in Finland
title: Finnair
